title: tAyin maNikkoDi
sahitya:
tAyin maNikkoDi vAnil uyarndE shenru
 parandiDavE adan kIzh ninru paNindiDuvOm


anupallavi

  jAtimatam mudal bhEdam marandu namadu mahAtmA Anai uNarndu
 satyamadainai bhaktiyAl ninaindu samattuvam peruvOmE


caraNam    bhArata bhUmiyil nAriyar karpin vIram uyarndulagam pugazhndoru
 vIram uNarttiDuvOm vIramum nenjil udAramum arivum
 Ikaiyum enrum kEkayarkkuNDu shenru viLangavum
 VeTri tarum jaya bhErikai koTTiDuvOmE
